sen.e: 79.98 meter long walls stretch east and west and the Shunka-mon gate and Shumei-mon gate are placed on the ends with guardhouses on both the east and west side of the gates and the guards of Hyoefu (Headquarters of the Middle Palace Guards) keep guard using torchlight.

sen.j: 白馬節会がこの門前で行われた事から「青馬陣」ともいい、内裏の南にあるから「南端門」ともいい、外郭にあるから「外門」ともいい、「南面僻杖中門」ともいった。
sen.e: Since the Hakuba no sechi e (seasonal court banquets) took place in front of this gate, it is also called Aouma no jin, and Nantan-mon gate (南端門) as it is located on the south side of the Palace and 南面僻杖中門.
